studienarbeit.prototype

Class EvaluationMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • studienarbeit.prototype.EvaluationMode

  • public class EvaluationMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Computes similarity for all enabled metrics between all training data sets.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getOutput

        private java.lang.String getOutput(java.util.List<ResultsEvalMode> results)
        Format the results of the evaluation. For each comparison, one line is created. The first two columns contain the name of the respective corpora. The remaining values are the similarity scores for the respective metrics. Everything is separated by whitespaces. The first line, the header, contains the names of the metrics.
        Parameters:
        results - the results of the similarity computations
        Returns:
        the output as String

      • getSimilarityForMetrics

        private java.util.List<ResultsEvalMode> getSimilarityForMetrics(java.util.List<dkpro.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasure> metrics,
                                                      java.util.List<TextData> training_data)
                                                         throws dkpro.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityException
        Compute the similarity and return the results. For each metric, all training data sets are compared with each other. For comparisons within the same corpus, a training / test data split has to be used to ensure valid evaluation. This is handled in NLTK.
        Parameters:
        metrics - the metrics to be used during evaluation
        training_data - the training data sets between which similarity should be computed
        Returns:
        results of the similarity comparisons
        Throws:
        dkpro.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityException

      • run

        void run()
   throws dkpro.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityException,
          org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
          java.io.IOException
        Execute the evaluation and write the output to file. Reads the training data sets. Then pairwise similarity comparisons are performed between all training data sets. The results are not ranked or sorted and written to the files is "evaluation.txt". The output contains a line for each combination of training data sets, containing the names of the data sets and the results for all enabled metrics. The fist line contains a header with the names of the respective metrics.
        Throws:
        dkpro.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityException
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        java.io.IOException
